resources.string: INSTRUO, the technical fest of IIEST SHIBPUR, was first organised in the year 2009 with the aim of promoting scientific temper and technological innovation among the students. Over the subsequent years it has become a carnival for all those students, who are interested in maneuvering their technical genes and competing with participants of comparable level of enthusiasm.The fest is a blend of various technical and nontechnical events , series of lectures, seminars and exhibitions which will enrich students of various disciplines with advanced knowledge in their field of interest. Thus, INSTRUO serves as a cradle for creating solutions powered by technology to improve the standard of a common man.

Workshops are conducted as pre Instruo events and aims to inculcate awareness amongst the participants about the technologies prevalent in the respective industry apart from theoretical knowledge. The attendees will be guided and trained by the two well acclaimed trainers.

Creativity and Innovation faces no hindrance from factors like resources, comfort zone, weather etcand therefore to foster up your creativity INSTRUO comes up with its first MODEL EXHIBITION event during INSTRUO 2019 where your functional working models will be judged by eminent personalities from various industrial and technical backgrounds. So now itâ€™s your turn to fasten your seat belts and let your ideas and notions take off on the journey of on-ground realisation. Do take note that the selected models for final exhibition may get partial financial support with the prior approval of their respective departments and the convener of INSTRUO 2019.
Indian Institute of Engineering Science and Technology, Shibpur
IIEST, Shibpur\n P.O.:- Botanical Garden, Howrah - 711103\n West Bengal, India
The Largest Technical Fest of Kolkata
*For participation in all events except Gaming and Robotics
